# GitHub Copilot Instructions for Portfolio Project

## Project Overview

This is a personal portfolio repository. The purpose of this repository is to showcase projects, skills, and professional information.

## Development Guidelines

### Code Style
- Write clean, readable, and maintainable code
- Follow best practices for the specific technologies used in this portfolio
- Use meaningful variable and function names
- Add comments only when necessary to explain complex logic

### File Organization
- Keep project structure organized and logical
- Group related files together
- Use clear and descriptive file names

### Documentation
- Maintain an up-to-date README.md with project information
- Document setup and deployment instructions when applicable
- Include inline documentation for complex features

### Version Control
- Write clear, descriptive commit messages
- Keep commits focused and atomic
- Use conventional commit format when possible (e.g., feat:, fix:, docs:)

## Best Practices

### Security
- Never commit sensitive information (API keys, passwords, tokens)
- Use environment variables for configuration
- Follow security best practices for any frameworks or libraries used

### Performance
- Optimize assets (images, scripts, styles) for web delivery
- Consider loading times and user experience
- Implement lazy loading where appropriate

### Accessibility
- Follow WCAG guidelines for accessibility
- Use semantic HTML elements
- Ensure proper contrast ratios and keyboard navigation

### Responsive Design
- Design mobile-first when building UI components
- Test across different screen sizes and devices
- Use modern CSS techniques for responsive layouts

## Testing
- Test all functionality before committing
- Verify cross-browser compatibility when applicable
- Ensure responsive design works across devices

## Additional Notes
- This is a personal portfolio project - prioritize showcasing skills and creativity
- Keep dependencies minimal and up-to-date
- Regularly review and update content to reflect current work and skills
